title: Two-Week Bar Launch Countdown
system_mod: Deliver a day-by-day countdown plan focusing on menu finalization, batch math, par levels, staff training blocks, and go-live checklists. Avoid cocktail theory—stay tactical.
venue_context: New coastal brasserie opening in 14 days; small team with mixed experience; limited dry storage; soft opening planned for friends/family.
prompt: We open in exactly two weeks. I need a realistic schedule for bar prep, batching, training, and soft opening to hit the ground running without chaos. What’s the plan?
